## Load required packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
```

## Load data
```{r}
pop_list <- c("NBS", "AI", "EBS", "GOA", "SEAK")
for(a in 1:4){
  for(b in 1:5){
    tmp <- paste0("/fs/cbsubscb16/storage/rkc/localscore/output/",pop_list[a],"-",pop_list[b],"_xi2.ls")
    if(file.exists(tmp) == T){
      assign(paste0(pop_list[a],"_",pop_list[b],"_out"), read_delim(tmp, col_names = F, delim = " "))
    }
  }
}
```
